fields.label: You're Ready to Build an Annual Report! Woo!
fields.message: This is is the builder for the page. To add a new section click that big blue "Add a Section To This Report" Button down below. You'll see you have a few options. To start, let's select "Intro Section."

fields.label: Sections
fields.name: page_sections

sub_fields.label: About the Intro Section
sub_fields.message: This section creates a big full-screen image section with your logo and your introduction text. Learn More.

sub_fields.label: BGCA Default Intro or Build Your Own Intro?
sub_fields.name: content

sub_fields.label: Up Next:
sub_fields.message:
You're using the BGCA default intro section for this page, so you're good to go with this section!

You're ready to add a new section to your report. You can do whatever you like here, but we'd recommend moving into the 'Who We Are / About Us', which you can select from the "Add a Section To This Report" button below.

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: hero_image
sub_fields.instructions: This is the background image for the page.

sub_fields.label: Heading Text
sub_fields.name: hero_content_heading
sub_fields.placeholder: example: The Boys & Girls Clubs of Memphis 2016 Annual Report

sub_fields.label: Subheading Text
sub_fields.name: hero_content_subheading
sub_fields.placeholder: Example: A Year of Helping Area Kids Stay Healthy & Happy

sub_fields.label: Content's Horizontal Alignment
sub_fields.name: hero_content_horiz_alignment
sub_fields.instructions: Got text on somebody's face? Let's try and move it out of the way to the right or left.

sub_fields.label: Content's Vertical Alignment
sub_fields.name: hero_content_vert_alignment
sub_fields.instructions: Still got text showing up where you don't want it? You can move it up or down here.

sub_fields.label: Up Next:
sub_fields.message:
You're using your own content and it's going to look awesome.

When you're ready to add a new section to your report... You can do whatever you like here, but we'd recommend moving into the 'Who We Are / About Us', which you can select from the "Add a Section To This Report" button below.

sub_fields.label: About The Who We Are Section
sub_fields.message: Tell us a quick bit of information about your organization and let us know what locations are affiliated with you. *If you haven't added any locations yet, you can do so here. Learn More.

sub_fields.label: Description
sub_fields.name: subheading
sub_fields.default_value: example: Since 1972, the Boys & Girls Clubs of Orlando, Florida serve over 12,000 area youth with after-school activities, healthy meals, activities and more!

sub_fields.label: Location
sub_fields.name: location
sub_fields.instructions: Choose a location from the list. If you don't see your location, click here to create it. Then, come back to this page and select your new location. We do this because, over the years, you may add or lose locations.

sub_fields.label: About the Executive Letter Section
sub_fields.message: Here's the letter from an important person (Executive Director, Board Member, Program Manager, whomever) at your organization. If you don't have a letter handy, no worries! You can use the default letter from the President of BGCA. This section looks like this: Learn More.

sub_fields.label: Letter to Use
sub_fields.name: letter_to_use
sub_fields.instructions: Would you like to use the BGCA president's letter for this year here, or would you like to write your own letter?

sub_fields.label: Executive Section Photo
sub_fields.name: executives_photo
sub_fields.instructions: This image can be just of the Club, the kids, the executive or ideally the Executive in a Club with the Kids.

sub_fields.label: Synopsis Sentences
sub_fields.name: executives_lead_in
sub_fields.instructions: This is a sentence or two for folks who are going to be too lazy to read this whole letter. It shows directly under the image.
sub_fields.placeholder: example:  This was a big year for our Clubs: with over 200 new members and our brand new location in South City.

sub_fields.label: First Sentences
sub_fields.name: supporting_copy_for_pull_quote
sub_fields.instructions: The first few sentences of your letter - which should provide a warm welcome to the individuals visiting the page.
sub_fields.placeholder: example: Dear Club Supporter, Last year was a year of successes and challenges for our Clubs.....

sub_fields.label: Letter
sub_fields.name: letter
sub_fields.instructions: Put in the rest of the letter here.

sub_fields.label: About the Youth Profile Section
sub_fields.message: This section creates a styled long-form story to highlight one of your Club Youth or perhaps several Youth. When you're done editing, it looks like this: Learn More.

sub_fields.label: Letter to Use
sub_fields.name: letter_to_use
sub_fields.instructions: Would you like to use the presidents letter for this year here, or would you like to write your own letter?

sub_fields.label: What Kind of Story is This?
sub_fields.name: profile_type

sub_fields.label: Synopsis Sentences
sub_fields.name: youths_lead_in
sub_fields.instructions: This is a sentence or two for folks who are going to be too lazy to read this whole profile. It shows directly under the image.

sub_fields.label: Pull Quote
sub_fields.name: pull_quote
sub_fields.instructions: A short quote from the profile.

sub_fields.label: Intro Sentences
sub_fields.name: supporting_copy_for_pull_quote
sub_fields.placeholder: example: When Michael first came to the Clubs, he didn't know anybody in town and was living out of the back of his mom's car.

sub_fields.label: About the General Story Section
sub_fields.message: This section creates a styled long-form story that you can use to tell any story you would like: Learn More.

sub_fields.label: Synopsis Sentences
sub_fields.name: story_lead_in
sub_fields.instructions: This is a sentence or two for folks who are going to be too lazy to read this whole profile. It shows directly under the image.

sub_fields.label: About the Areas of Focus Section
sub_fields.message: Areas of Focus are the general fields in which your Clubs Work. For example: Academics, Athletics, Nutrition, Public Service, Youth with Special Needs. You can add as many (or few of these as you like). When you're done editing, it looks like this: Learn More.

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: media_id
sub_fields.instructions: If this is a video, this image is used as the preload image -  use the first frame of the video if you can.

sub_fields.label: Wins list
sub_fields.name: wins_list
sub_fields.instructions: List out major accomplishments for your Club in this area of focus for the past year.

sub_fields.label: Win description
sub_fields.name: win_description
sub_fields.placeholder: example: Last year, we served 30,000 healthy meals

sub_fields.label: About the Numbers Section
sub_fields.message: This section is for highlighting quantifiable successes. We have a few different graphing options available to you. So whether you want a pie chart, a line graph or just a big number, we've got you covered. Learn More.

sub_fields.label: Numbers Intro Text
sub_fields.name: lead_in_content
sub_fields.instructions: This is the intro text for this section.
sub_fields.placeholder: example: We did so many great things this year, and we have numbers.

sub_fields.label: About the Financials Section
sub_fields.message: Every annual report has to have one! Give us your itemized expenses and income sources. Learn More.

sub_fields.label: Financials Intro Text
sub_fields.name: lead_in
sub_fields.placeholder: example: Boys & Girls Club of Clark County Financials for 2019....

sub_fields.label: Dollar Amount
sub_fields.name: number
sub_fields.instructions: * Whole numbers only, no dollar signs or punctuation.

sub_fields.label: Expenses Description Text
sub_fields.name: expenses_copy
sub_fields.instructions: This is an optional text area to describe expenses in more depth.

sub_fields.label: Dollar Amount
sub_fields.name: number
sub_fields.instructions: * Whole numbers only. No punctuation or dollar signs needed.

sub_fields.label: Revenue Expenses Description
sub_fields.name: revenue_copy
sub_fields.instructions: Talk a bit about where this money came from in more depth.

sub_fields.label: Miscellaneous Financials
sub_fields.name: misc_line_items
sub_fields.instructions: This is for the weird stuff like investment portfolios and endowments.

sub_fields.label: Dollar Amount
sub_fields.name: number
sub_fields.instructions: * Whole numbers only. No punctuation or dollar signs needed.

sub_fields.label: Miscellaneous Financials Description
sub_fields.name: misc_copy
sub_fields.instructions: Talk a bit about these items in more depth.

sub_fields.label: About the Year in the Club Section
sub_fields.message: This shows all the events that have happened in the Club over the past year. Learn More.

sub_fields.label: Section Intro
sub_fields.name: lead_in
sub_fields.instructions: Share any takeaway notes for the year.
sub_fields.placeholder: example: 2020 was a big year for the Boys & Girls Clubs of Chocteau County.

sub_fields.label: Events this Year
sub_fields.name: events
sub_fields.instructions: Add each memorable event from the Annual Report Year. After adding all your events, drag and drop them into chronological order.

sub_fields.label: Date
sub_fields.name: date
sub_fields.instructions: At this time, all dates have to be a fixed date with a day, month and year. If this event spans a period of time, simply select the first date of that span.

sub_fields.label: Name of the Event
sub_fields.name: title
sub_fields.instructions: What was this event?

sub_fields.label: Event Description
sub_fields.name: content
sub_fields.instructions: Write a couple sentences about this event.

sub_fields.label: About Important People
sub_fields.message: Whether listing your staff of your board, this section lets you display a group of people with a photo and short description of each. Learn More.

sub_fields.label: Social Media Links
sub_fields.name: links
sub_fields.instructions: Adding these is entirely optional.

sub_fields.label: About the Programs Section
sub_fields.message: This is a section where visitors can scroll through the programs offered at your Club. Add from a catalogue of default BGCA programs and add your own. Learn More.

sub_fields.label: Subheading
sub_fields.name: subheading
sub_fields.placeholder: A small sample of what the Clubs offer

sub_fields.label: Program Source
sub_fields.name: program_source
sub_fields.instructions: Do you want to choose a program from the library or do you want to make your own custom program?

sub_fields.label: Custom Content for National Programs
sub_fields.message: You can use your own customized description and photo of this program if you like. If you leave the below fields empty, the default content for this program from BGCA will show instead.

sub_fields.label: Program Subtitle
sub_fields.name: lead_in
sub_fields.instructions: Provide a very short description of this program.

sub_fields.label: Photo
sub_fields.name: photo
sub_fields.instructions: Upload a photograph of this program.

sub_fields.label: About the Donor Section
sub_fields.message: Here we can create different lists of donors that we want to thank for their support over this particular calendar year. Learn More.

sub_fields.label: About the Call to Action Section
sub_fields.message: The Call to Action is best utilized at the very bottom of your annual report so visitors know what to do next, but you can also throw these in throughout the design to get visitors to give, follow or volunteer. Learn More.

sub_fields.label: Subtitle
sub_fields.name: subheader
sub_fields.placeholder: example: Your gift to the Boys & Girls Clubs of Monroe Township will help serve over 15,000 deserving kids.

fields.button_label: Add a Section to this Report
